attribute.description: Access key to transfer focus to the input element.
attribute.name: accesskey

attribute.description: Alternate textual description of the input element.
attribute.name: alt

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Direction indication for text that does not inherit directionality.
attribute.name: dir

attribute.description: Disables the input element, default is false.
attribute.name: disabled

attribute.description: The size of the input.Possible values are xs (extra small), sm (small), md (medium) and lg (large) .
attribute.name: fieldSize

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Flag indicating that, if this component is activated by the user, notifications should be delivered to interested listeners and actions immediately (that is, during Apply Request Values phase) rather than waiting until Invoke Application phase. Default is false.
attribute.name: immediate

attribute.description: The Label of the field .
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: A localized user presentable name.
attribute.name: lang

attribute.description: Maximum height of the options panel.
attribute.name: maxHeight

attribute.description: Text which is displayed if no option has been selected.
attribute.name: nonSelectedText

attribute.description: Text which is displayed if more than numberDisplayed options have been selected.
attribute.name: nSelectedText

attribute.description: Text which is displayed if every option has been selected.
attribute.name: allSelectedText

attribute.description: Maximum number of options displayed in the button.
attribute.name: numberDisplayed

attribute.description: If true, you can select every option with a single click.
attribute.name: includeSelectAllOption

attribute.description: The text displayed for the select all option.
attribute.name: selectAllText

attribute.description: Set to true or false to enable or disable the filter. A filter input will be added to dynamically filter all options.
attribute.name: enableFiltering

attribute.description: The placeholder used for the filter input.
attribute.name: filterPlaceholder

attribute.description: Set to true to display radiobuttons instead of checkboxes. Of course, in this case you can only select one option, so the widget's name is sort of a misnomer.
attribute.name: radiobuttons

attribute.description: If true, the button is disabled if no options are given.
attribute.name: disableIfEmpty

attribute.description: Moves the drop-down-area from the left hand side to the right hand side.
attribute.name: dropRight

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when input element loses focus and its value has been modified since gaining focus.
attribute.name: onchange

attribute.description: Client side callback called when the drop-down area is shown.
attribute.name: ondropdownshow

attribute.description: Client side callback called when the drop-down area is hidden.
attribute.name: ondropdownhide

attribute.description: The CSS class of the button.
attribute.name: buttonClass

attribute.description: Style class of the input element. Is translated to the buttonContainer attribute.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: The width of the multiselect button may be fixed using this option.
attribute.name: buttonWidth

attribute.description: If set to true, the filter is case-insensitive.
attribute.name: enableCaseInsensitiveFiltering

attribute.description: The placeholder attribute shows text in a field until the field is focused upon, then hides the text.
attribute.name: placeholder

attribute.description: Flag indicating that this input element will prevent changes by the user.
attribute.name: readonly

attribute.description: Allows you to suppress automatic rendering of labels. Used by AngularFaces, too.
attribute.name: renderLabel

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Boolean value Require input in the component when the form is submitted.
attribute.name: required

attribute.description: Message to show if the user did not specify a value and the attribute required is set to true.
attribute.name: requiredMessage

attribute.description: Number of characters used to determine the width of the input element.
attribute.name: size

attribute.description: The size of the input specified as number of grid columns.
attribute.name: span

attribute.description: Inline style of the input element.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Advisory tooltip information.
attribute.name: tabindex

attribute.description: Advisory tooltip information.
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: The text of the tooltip.
attribute.name: tooltip

attribute.description: The tooltip is shown and hidden with a delay. This value is the delay in milliseconds. Defaults to 0 (no delay).
attribute.name: tooltipDelay

attribute.description: The tooltip is hidden with a delay. This value is the delay in milliseconds. Defaults to 0 (no delay).
attribute.name: tooltipDelayHide

attribute.description: The tooltip is shown with a delay. This value is the delay in milliseconds. Defaults to 0 (no delay).
attribute.name: tooltipDelayShow

attribute.description: Where is the tooltip to be displayed? Possible values: "top", "bottom", "right", "left", "auto", "auto top", "auto bottom", "auto right" and "auto left". Default to "bottom".
attribute.name: tooltipPosition

attribute.description: Value.
attribute.name: value
